channel.title: Interleaved RSS Feed
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from each RSS source, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Is Embarrassing Herself On Motion To Vacate
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) keeps meeting with Speaker Johnson, threatening him, then embarrassingly giving him more time.

item.title: This North Carolina Sheriff Should Know Better
item.description: Generally speaking, police chiefs – particularly those in major urban areas – support illegal alien sanctuary policies that prohibit them from cooperating with federal immigration officials. They’re often pressured to do so by the politicians and special interests who appoint and influence them. To read the rest of the article click here The post This North Carolina Sheriff Should Know Better appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Trump May Be Heading To Jail As He Attacks On Stormy Daniels During Court Break
item.description: Trump appears to have violated the gag order by reposting an old attack on Stormy Daniels during the break in her testimony.

item.title: Stats Show Fentanyl Replacing Heroin as Cartel Cash Cow
item.description: Fentanyl is rapidly replacing heroin as the drug cartels are using to make money. Statistics on drug seizures from U.S. Customs and Border Protection (CBP) show that there has been a clear shift in the cartels’ smuggling habits, and the data strongly indicate that the border chaos of recent years is facilitating this lethal trade. [...] The post Stats Show Fentanyl Replacing Heroin as Cartel Cash Cow appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene Demands That Mike Johnson Defund Jack Smith
item.description: Rep. Marjorie Taylor Greene (R-GA) has listed her demands of Speaker Mike Johnson for her to drop her motion to vacate, which include defunding Jack Smith.

item.title: Illegal Aliens Issue List of Demands After Hundreds Take Over City Park and Refuse to Leave
item.description: In a brazen display of entitlement, hundreds of illegal aliens from Africa and Venezuela swarmed and took over Powell Barnett Park in Seattle. To read the rest of the article click here The post Illegal Aliens Issue List of Demands After Hundreds Take Over City Park and Refuse to Leave appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Trump Told Stormy Daniels That She Reminded Him Of His Daughter Ivanka
item.description: Stormy Daniels said that Trump told her that she reminded him of his daughter Ivanka Trump.

item.title: Japan is not Xenophobic, but Seems Poised to Repeat our Mistakes
item.description: On Wednesday President Biden chastised America’s most important Pacific ally, Japan, as xenophobic. He smeared India with the same insult, conflating both democracies with China and Russia — suggesting tight borders as the primary driver of economic woes in all four. To read the rest of the article click here The post Japan is not Xenophobic, but Seems Poised to Repeat our Mistakes appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.

item.title: Stormy Daniels Is Giving Details And Humiliating Trump In Court
item.description: Donald Trump claims that the affair with Stormy Daniels never happened, but Daniels is in court providing details.

item.title: Ireland At the Breaking Point on Immigration
item.description: A weekend of forcefully suppressed protests against mass immigration in Ireland has underlined the growing disconnect between the government and the people. There has been understandable concern over Irish communities being forced to house and pay for migrant men without the locals being consulted. To read the rest of the article click here The post Ireland At the Breaking Point on Immigration appeared first on ImmigrationReform.com.
